thread.title: William Fox
thread.title_full: Premium Mortgage reviewed by William Fox

author: William Fox
title: William Fox
text: I have recommended and used Premium Mortgage for many years. My Mortgage Consultant, Nancy Frate, and her team have provided exceptional service and a steady stream of communications to both my clients and myself from application to closing. This is incredibly important to me as they are an extension and reflection on myself and my business reputation.
